FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Slave Plantation
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: Slaves work the fields here. +20% food production.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Adventurer's Guild
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A place for traveling adventurers to meet up and spend a night. -15% production to food, weapons, and apparel. +5% basetax. +1 military level.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Public Market
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A public market to exchange goods. +15 tithe modifer.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Jailhouse
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A place to store criminal scum. -25% unrest gain, -5% tax.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Wilderness Guild
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A guild dedicated to taming the wilderness. +25% animal production.
